long_description: The Watchtower daypack from Jansport is streetwise and ready for action. It carries books and notebooks, your favorite hoodie and electronics, and any other daily wares you can't do without. Large main compartment; versatile padded sleeve carries a 15 in. laptop or a 3-liter hydration reservoir (sold separately). Main pocket also features a soft tricot-lined tablet pocket and organizer panel. Front zippered insulated pocket. 2 front gear pockets. 2 side pockets; 1 is open and 1 is zippered. Quick-access top pocket. Watchtower daypack has side compression straps and genuine leather JanSport label and trims. Padded S-curve shoulder straps provide a comfortable carry; sternum strap holds a heavy pack in place.
short_description: The Watchtower daypack from Jansport is streetwise and ready for action. It carries books and notebooks, your favorite hoodie and electronics, and any other daily wares you can't do without.
